nodes.text: The Omman Minor system was a star system in the Outer Rim's Kibilini sector, located near Socorro. It contained the planet Omman Minor.

The planet Omman was created in When the Domino Falls, near Socorro. But after an other Omman was mentionned in the Tion Cluster, the first was identified as Omman Minor by the The Essential Atlas Online Companion. Although it was published later, The Essential Reader's Companion didn't noticed this retcon.
